DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Pregnancy Female Patient Comprehensive Care Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator for planned, non-emergency care that includes prevention and maintance and restoration of health for pregnant female patients and a health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Pregnancy Female Patient Comprehensive Care
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to planned, non-emergency care that includes prevention and maintance and restoration of health for pregnant female patients and a health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: The condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body, after union of an ovum and spermatozoon. (Dorland, 27th ed):In zoology, denoting the sex that bears the young or the ovum.:A person who requires medical care.:Planned, non-emergency care that includes prevention and maintance and restoration of health.

Concepts.definition: The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.
A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Planned, non-emergency care that includes prevention and maintance and restoration of health.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an indicator for comprehensive care (medical/dental treatment of care in relation to the affect it has on the whole body) in professional practice.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No apparent change or worsening in lesion staging classification.

Concepts.definition: No apparent change or worsening in lesion staging classification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Do you provide comprehensive dental care for pregnant women in your practice
